channel.title: CVE Feed for WAGO -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WAGO -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1619|2024-08-02T05:57:24.337Z -- wago -- 750-8202%2Fxxx-xxx
item.description: Multiple WAGO devices in multiple versions may allow an authenticated remote attacker with high privileges to DoS the device by sending a malformed packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-1698|2024-08-02T05:57:24.816Z -- wago -- compact%20controller%20cc100
item.description: In multiple products of WAGO a vulnerability allows an unauthenticated, remote attacker to create new users and change the device configuration which can result in unintended behaviour, Denial of Service and full system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2023-1620|2024-08-02T05:57:24.833Z -- wago -- 750-8202%2Fxxx-xxx
item.description: Multiple WAGO devices in multiple versions may allow an authenticated remote attacker with high privileges to DoS the device by sending a specifically crafted packet to the CODESYS V2 runtime.

item.title: CVE-2023-1150|2024-08-02T05:40:57.941Z -- wago -- 750-332
item.description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in Series WAGO 750-3x/-8x products may allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to DoS the MODBUS server with specially crafted packets.
